comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: JM-1 Bureau Number 66599. Formerly labeled an AT-23 (trainer version of the B-26), AAF serial 41-35542. Unusual scoop modification on the left waist gunner's port. Surplused at war's end and converted to an executive transport, registered as N171E; later changed to N501T. Reported scrapped in May 1965.
